SickKids 受到 BORN Ontario 数据泄露影响，涉案人数达 340 万https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/sickkids-impacted-by-born-ontario-data-breach-that-hit-34-million/ Tue, 26 Sep 2023 05:20:00 -0400阿克斯·夏尔马Securityhttps://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/sickkids-impacted-by-born-ontario-data-breach-that-hit-34-million/ The Hospital for Sick Children, more commonly known as SickKids, is among healthcare providers that were impacted by the recent breach at BORN Ontario. The top Canadian pediatric hospital disclosed that as a part of its operations, it shares personal health information with BORN Ontario "related to pregnancy, birth and newborn care." [...]
